## Load libraries and scripts
```{r}

if(!require(pacman)) {
  install.packages("pacman")
  library(pacman)
}

p_load(tidyverse)
p_load(edgeR)
p_load(limma)
p_load(mixOmics)
p_load(RUVSeq)
p_load(EDASeq)
p_load(RColorBrewer)
p_load(lazyeval)
		
source( '../Common/edgeR_common_functions.R')
source( '../../../Common/global_parameters.R')
source( '../../../Common/helper_functions.R')

sessionInfo()

```
